text: Iâ€™m sure it will be! Do you have a rough idea of where you would like to head once you graduate? I know your looking for comp/roto prep but are you thinking in film, tv or advertising? Or a mix of all of them? When you came for your studio tours which did you like the vibe of??
My goal used to be always film but now I think I prefer tv and advertising. I have always wanted to work for dneg as well but am unsure if I would be able to get in, but I also quite liked the mill.
